PyDune.Physics.Dune.CourrechDuPont2014¶

Dune growth mechanism theory developped by Courrech du Pont et al. 2014.

References

[1] Courrech du Pont, S., Narteau, C., & Gao, X. (2014). Two modes for dune orientation. Geology, 42(9), 743-746.

Functions

Bed_Instability_Orientation(theta, Q0[, …])

Calculate the dune orientation growing from the flat bed instability as the maximum of the dimensional growth rate calculated in Courrech du Pont at al.

Elongation_direction(theta, Q0[, gamma, …])

Calculate the elongation direction as the dune orientation for wich the components of the resultant sand flux at the dune crest perpendicular to the dune crest cancel each other out.

Flux_at_crest(alpha, theta, Q0[, gamma])

Calculation of the sand flux at the dune crest:

Growth_rate(alpha, theta, Q0[, gamma, axis, …])

Calculate the dune growth rate using the dimensional analysis from Courrech du Pont et al. 2014.

Resultant_flux_at_crest(alpha, theta, Q0[, …])

Resultant flux (i.e vectorial average) of the sand flux at the crest.

Resultant_flux_perp_crest_at_crest(alpha, …)

Component of the resultant flux (i.e vectorial average) at the crest perpendicular to the dune crest.
